entries.meaning: (historical) A device that transmitted sound on a beam of light.
(obsolete) A home phone with integral picture frame
(dated) A stills-only cameraphone. Used to distinguish from video-capable camera cellphones and camera-less cellphones.
examples: Coordinate terms: videophone, featurephone, selfie camera, cellphone, mobile phone

entries.meaning: A combination highly-capable digital camera and smartphone
examples: Coordinate terms: cameraphone, smartphone, cellphone, mobile phone, mobile device, mobile, DSLR, ZLR, mirrorless camera
